about_the_game:
Hentai Cleopatra is an exciting game that combines puzzles, an intriguing storyline, and a seductive atmosphere inspired by the legendary queen of Egypt. You will immerse yourself in the world of ancient Egypt, where power, passion, and mysteries intertwine into a single story. The main heroine of the game is the charming Cleopatra—a wise, powerful, and incredibly attractive queen who uses both her intelligence and natural beauty to rule her kingdom and captivate the hearts of the most influential men.

However, her greatest weapon is not only political intrigue and diplomacy but also her ability to enchant, seduce, and manipulate her enemies, creating a unique atmosphere of power and desire.

Three difficulty levels:

  • Easy - for those who want to enjoy the story and puzzles without excessive challenges.

  • Normal - a perfect balance between challenges and an engaging storyline.

  • Hard - for players seeking serious intellectual challenges.

Game Features:

  • 30 levels, each revealing new secrets of Cleopatra;

  • 30 achievements for true conquerors;

  • A gallery with the hottest scenes;

  • Various difficulty levels;

  • Relaxing, oriental music that transports you to the age of the pharaohs.

Solve puzzles, unlock sensual scenes, and dive into the legend of Hentai Cleopatra - a game that enchants, seduces, and leaves unforgettable impressions.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended exclusively for an adult audience, as it contains mature content, including frequent nudity and explicit sexual scenes.

A significant part of the gallery features images of naked bodies, highlighting underwear, exposed legs, buttocks, breasts, genitalia, and the use of various toys.

name: Hentai Cleopatra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB GeForce or AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
